description: Revokes ingress from a DBSecurityGroup for previously authorized IP ranges or EC2 or VPC security groups. Required parameters for this API are one of CIDRIP, EC2SecurityGroupId for VPC, or (EC2SecurityGroupOwnerId and either EC2SecurityGroupName or EC2SecurityGroupId).

parameters.name: DBSecurityGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the DB security group to revoke ingress from.

nested_items.name: DBSecurityGroup
nested_items.description: Contains the details for an Amazon RDS DB security group.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: Provides the Amazon Web Services ID of the owner of a specific DB security group.

nested_items.name: DBSecurityGroupName
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the DB security group.

nested_items.name: DBSecurityGroupDescription
nested_items.description: Provides the description of the DB security group.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: Provides the VpcId of the DB security group.

nested_items.name: EC2SecurityGroups
nested_items.description: Contains a list of EC2SecurityGroup elements.

nested_items.name: IPRanges
nested_items.description: Contains a list of IPRange elements.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the IP range. Status can be 'authorizing', 'authorized', 'revoking', and 'revoked'.

nested_items.name: DBSecurityGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB security group.
